title: Disabled DS Thresh
body:
Pls rito. I bought the skin then as soon as I pressed play the thing popped up next to the LoL logo in the client saying it's been disabled. Haven't even been able to try it in a custom BibleThump. It's been nearly 2 days it's been disabled and I know bugs can sometimes be hard to find but come on bru. 


{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Now heres the problem aswell

theyve released it and now during the sale, its unbuyable. so are we missing out on the sale or is it going to be extended?
The sale on the Dark Star Thresh bundle will be extended until June 27th.
1820 skins don't go on sale at release.
Theres a bundle (as jason pointed out)
Ah yeah, bundle is if you want ward and summoner icons because both Dark Star Thresh and Varus don't get a discount in that bundle.
I believe he may be refering to the bundle (which i believe is a cheaper way to get it all)
